Autoplay

Autoplay is simple, when set to true, Amplitude.js will play the song you set to to be the start song, or the first song in your config.

    Amplitude.init({
        "songs": [
            {
                "name": "Song Name 1",
                "artist": "Artist Name",
                "album": "Album Name",
                "url": "/song/url.mp3",
                "cover_art_url": "/cover/art/url.jpg"
            },
            {
                "name": "Song Name 2",
                "artist": "Artist Name",
                "album": "Album Name",
                "url": "/song/url.mp3",
                "cover_art_url": "/cover/art/url.jpg"
            },
            {
                "name": "Song Name 3",
                "artist": "Artist Name",
                "album": "Album Name",
                "url": "/song/url.mp3",
                "cover_art_url": "/cover/art/url.jpg"
            }
        ],
        "autoplay": true
    });

This will play the first song in the config on page load.
